page.title: 12MICRO-LIGHT AIRCRAFT
page.content: {Mr. Chris. Draper}has been making micro_light aircraft for 3 yrs. It is called a Weight Shift Model and can hold four and a half gallons of 94 octane petrol with oil ratio of 32_1. It can travel for 150 miles with two people. The engine is a 440cc Japanese Fuji Robin. It's wing is 195 sq.ft. and is made of rip_stop nylon. The span is 34ft. and 9ft.3in.cord. The weight is 147 kg. This is a machine for good weather. Police in the U.S.A. use it for watching traffic. The British army are considering using it. It is very useful for aerial photography. The frame is made of Mandrail Drawn aluminium tube.
